title: [Skin] Spooky Bard
body: I really like Bard's base design and wanted to try creating a Spooky Bard skin concept, what with Halloween coming up soon. Comes complete with lil' ghostie Meeps (Eeps?) and spoopy aesthetic. I'm keen on receiving feedback on any aspect of this, whether it's for the design itself or the art side of things. Fire away :>
